title: CompositeDeviceAdd
description: JSON schema for the compositeDeviceAdd event

deviceType.title: Device type
deviceType.description: Device types tells what kind of device it is and with that what kind of attributes and abilities is available - must always be used in combination with deviceVersion and if composite with the sub/composite devices found under the devices list

deviceVersion.title: Device version
deviceVersion.description: The version of the composite template will typically be the version of the devices used to create the composite. If deviceType is "composite" deviceVersion is ignored.

productName.description: Only used with deviceType=composite: Used for miscellaneous data fields productName and deviceName.

hasOmniAntenna.description: DEPRECATED. Do not add this property. Will be disallowed in the future!

devicesCount.description: DEPRECATED. Do not add this property. Will be disallowed in the future!

deviceParentId.description: DEPRECATED. Do not add this property. Will be disallowed in the future!

deviceSerialNumber.title: Device serialnumber
deviceSerialNumber.description: A unique device serialnumber. Will be auto-generated if not supplied.
